title: Rep. Andy Biggs (R-AZ): Pardons For The Trump Family “Has To Be Real” Because Democrats “Are Out For Blood”
summary:

paragraphs: Embed the following code on your website:
Watch the latest video at foxnews.com
On Fox Across America with Jimmy Failla, Rep. Andy Biggs (R-AZ) explained why President Trump preemptively pardoning himself and his family might be necessary when he leaves office in January.

"I think that you have to take it seriously, because we've had so many prominent leftists in this country, including people who sit in Congress who are committee chairmen in the Democrat side, who say we need to continue some criminal investigations of Trump and his family and of his staff. Yeah, I think it's real. I think it has to be real."

"He has to face that because is this kind of a religious faith with the left. And Donald Trump to them is the conservative Antichrist to them. And so don't forget, they're going to go after me as a conservative legislator. This is not going to end. And that's why I don't know how we can say passively, let's just move on, let's pull it back together. Let's work across the aisle and smile. They're out for blood still. And that's what all tyrants do."
